attributes.action: Decriminalize Cannabis Instead Of Legalizing,Until Legalisation Is A Possibility
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis Decriminalization Has A Number Of Benificial Points Financial, Medical And Social! All Proven In USA & "Recently Discovered" By UK Health Officials.

A recent study by BDS Analytics, The impact of legalization has shifted Californians’ attitudes, opinions, motivations and actions in regards to cannabis. indicating—at least in the Golden State— cannabis’ archaic stigma is en route to extinction -Fobes Magazine

So We Ask You Please Give Us The Right To Be Not Hassled While Medicating
attributes.background: We Believe Decriminalizing Cannabis In The UK Could Be A Closer Step To A Lower Crime Rate & Social Relaxation. Money Being Spent On Policing More Serious Issues, Cell's Freed For Real Criminals & An Easier More Simple Way Towards Legalization Allowing People To Not Be Criminalized For Medicating.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

We don't understand what you mean by "Until Legalisation Is A Possibility".

You could sign this petition instead if you would like to see cannabis legalised:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229305
